picked_headlines.summary: Optimizing video analytics for poultry monitoring achieves 2x speedup with practical strategies.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: The article presents practical engineering solutions that can be applied across industries, showing significant efficiency improvements in real-world applications.

picked_headlines.summary: Explores AI's future scenarios, urging robust strategies for potential economic singularity or normalcy.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article is crucial for stakeholders and management to understand potential future impacts of AI, encouraging strategic planning and preparedness.

digest:
- *AutoNeural* optimizes Vision-Language Models for NPUs, reducing latency and enhancing efficiency: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.02924
- *DataGovBench* benchmarks LLMs for data governance, introducing DataGovAgent for improved task execution: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.04416
- *AgenticCyber* enhances cybersecurity with a GenAI multi-agent system, achieving 96.2% detection accuracy: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06396
- *Arc Gradient Descent* outperforms Adam in complex ML tasks, improving accuracy without overfitting: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06737
- *Venus* achieves 15x-131x speedup in video understanding with an efficient edge memory system: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07344
- *ProSocialAlign* enhances language model safety by steering responses towards empathy without retraining: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06515
- *LUNE* introduces an efficient framework for unlearning in LLMs, reducing computational costs: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07375
- *RLAX* enhances LLM quality and convergence on TPUs with scalable RL framework: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06392
- *PrivLLMSwarm* enables secure LLM inference for UAV swarms, balancing privacy and utility: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06747
- *CryptoTensors* offers a secure file format for LLMs, enhancing confidentiality and access control: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.04580
